name: Kitty Rescue Inc.
description:
Kitty Rescue Inc. is short game made for Global Game Jam.  This year the theme was duality. The game is about a hero who can walk or fly to rescue cats around the world.  You can fly above clouds when you walk in a vent tunnel. 

Credits: Kamil (code), Neska Gorska (design), tooloudtoowide (sound).
